programme.title: General Sir Charles Guthrie

programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is Chief of the Defence Staff General Sir Charles Guthrie.
programme.long_synopsis:
This week, Sue Lawley's castaway on Desert Island Discs is General Sir Charles Guthrie.

Favourite track: The Chorus of the Hebrew Slaves by Giuseppe Verdi
Book: Vol 1 of biography of the Duke of Wellington - Year of the Sword by Lady Longford
Luxury: Surfboard

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
